1.t: By the night when it covers the day,

2.t: by the day when it appears radiant,

3.t: and by that (Power) which created the male and female,

5.t: We shall facilitate the path to bliss

6.t: for those who spend for the cause of God,

7.t: observe piety, and believe in receiving rewards from God.

8.t: But for those who are niggardly, horde their wealth,

9.t: and have no faith in receiving any reward (from God).

10.t: We shall facilitate the path to affliction

11.t: and their wealth will be of no benefit to them when they face destruction.

12.t: Surely, in Our hands is guidance,

13.t: and to Us belong the hereafter and the worldly life.

14.t: I have warned you about the fierce blazing fire

15.t: in which no one will suffer forever

16.t: except the wicked ones who have rejected the (Truth) and have turned away from it.

17.t: The pious ones who spend for the cause of God

18.t: and purify themselves will be safe from this fire.

19.t: They do not expect any reward

20.t: except the pleasure of their Lord, the Most High

21.t: and the reward (of their Lord) will certainly make them happy.
